name: CITY OF RIVERSIDE, Objector v. RELIANCE INSURANCE COMPANY in Liquidation (Ancillary Matter to In re Reliance Insurance Company in Liquidation, No. 1 REL 2001). Appeal of City of Riverside, Objector

parties: CITY OF RIVERSIDE, Objector v. RELIANCE INSURANCE COMPANY in Liquidation (Ancillary Matter to In re Reliance Insurance Company in Liquidation, No. 1 REL 2001). Appeal of City of Riverside, Objector.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 12th day of March, 2014, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

CITY OF RIVERSIDE, Objector v. RELIANCE INSURANCE COMPANY in Liquidation (Ancillary Matter to In re Reliance Insurance Company in Liquidation, No. 1 REL 2001). Appeal of City of Riverside, Objector.
